DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety immunogenicity high-titered ALVAC-HIV MN120TMG ( vCP205 ) give sequentially simultaneously rgp120/HIV-1SF2 MF59 adjuvant emulsion HIV-negative volunteer . ALVAC-HIV vCP205 second-generation candidate vaccine use induce humoral cellular response several antigen . vCP205 express proteins two strain HIV ( MN LAI ) . rgp120/HIV-1SF2 express proteins different strain HIV . This study help show immune system respond proteins one strain virus .
DOC.brief_title: A Phase I Safety Immunogenicity Trial Live Recombinant Canarypox ALVAC-HIV ( vCP205 ) HIV-1 SF-2 rgp120 HIV-1 Uninfected Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: ALVAC-HIV vCP205 second-generation candidate vaccine use induce humoral cellular response several antigen . vCP205 express proteins two strain HIV ( MN LAI ) . rgp120/HIV-1SF2 express proteins different strain HIV . This study help show immune system respond proteins one strain virus . Six group 25 volunteer randomize receive simultaneous sequential dos ALVAC-HIV vCP205 SF2 rgp120 control vaccine ( ALVAC-RG rabies glycoprotein vCP65 BIOCINE Placebo Vaccine 2 ) . In group , 21 volunteer receive vaccine 4 receive control vaccine . Volunteers stratify low high risk sexual behavior . Immunizations give three group month 0 , 1 , 3 , 6 , 9 , 12 , three group month 0 , 1 , 6 , 9 , 12 . Volunteers follow 24 month .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers must : Normal history physical exam . Negative ELISA Western blot HIV . CD4 count > = 400 cells/mm3 . Normal urine dipstick esterase nitrite . NOTE : No 10 percent volunteer stratum may age 50 . Risk Behavior : Allowed volunteer stratify high risk stratum : High risk behavior HIV infection , injection drug use within past 12 month . high intermediate risk sexual behavior . Exclusion Criteria Coexisting Condition : Subjects follow symptoms condition exclude : Positive hepatitis B surface antigen . Medical psychiatric condition ( recent suicidal ideation present psychosis ) preclude compliance . Occupational responsibility preclude compliance . Active syphilis . NOTE : Subjects serology document false positive due remote ( > 6 month ) treat infection eligible . Active tuberculosis . NOTE : Subjects positive PPD normal chest xray show evidence TB require isoniazid therapy eligible . Allergy egg product neomycin . Occupational exposure bird . Subjects follow prior condition exclude : History immunodeficiency , chronic illness , autoimmune disease , use immunosuppressive medication . History anaphylaxis serious adverse reaction vaccine . Prior immunization rabies . History serious allergic reaction substance , require hospitalization emergent medical care ( e.g. , StevensJohnson syndrome , bronchospasm , hypotension ) . Prior psychiatric condition ( history suicide attempt past psychosis ) preclude compliance . History cancer unless surgical excision consider achieved cure . Prior Medication : Excluded : Live attenuate vaccine within 60 day prior study entry . NOTE : Medically indicate kill subunit vaccine ( e.g. , influenza , pneumococcal ) exclude administer least 2 week HIV immunization . Experimental agent within 30 day prior study entry . Prior HIV vaccine . Prior rabies immunization . Prior Treatment : Excluded : Blood product immunoglobulin within past 6 month . For volunteer stratify low risk stratum : High risk behavior HIV infection , injection drug use within past 12 month . high intermediate risk sexual behavior .
